abstract: Puerto Rico's government says preparations for Tropical Storm Erika have compelled it to delay unveiling plan to deal with its $72 billion of debt.
lead_paragraph: Citing time lost to a tropical storm, the government put off by one week a plan for a “negotiated moratorium” on $72 billion of debt.

headline.print_headline: Citing Storm, Puerto Rico Delays Plan

snippet: Citing time lost to a tropical storm, the government put off by one week a plan for a “negotiated moratorium” on $72 billion of debt.
